preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_name where name = "PH, Number of previous caesarean sections" and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" and locale = "en" and voided = 0;

changeSet.comment: Restrict decimals for PH, Number of previous caesarean sections concept
changeSet.sql: select concept_id into @concept_id from concept_name where name = "PH, Number of previous caesarean sections" and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" and locale = "en" and voided = 0; update concept_numeric set precise=0, display_precision=0, low_absolute=-0.1 where concept_id = @concept_id;

changeSet.author: Venky
